## Introduction

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```

```{r}
census_data <- read_csv("~/tricomm/table01.csv")
spec(census_data)
```

```{r}
# Load your pre-existing dataset
your_dataset <- read.csv("~/tricomm/table01.csv")  # Replace with the actual path

# Define the number of iterations
num_iterations <- 1000

# Initialize a vector to store the results
results <- numeric(num_iterations)

# Run the Monte Carlo simulation
for (i in 1:num_iterations) {
  # Sample from your pre-existing dataset
  sample_row <- your_dataset[sample(nrow(your_dataset), 1), ]
  
  # Extract variables of interest
  variable1 <- sample_row$Variable1
  variable2 <- sample_row$Variable2
  
  # Run your simulation or model with the sampled values
  result <- variable1 * variable2
  
  # Store the result
  results[i] <- result
}

# Analyze the results
summary(results)
hist(results, main = "Monte Carlo Simulation Results", xlab = "Outcome")
```
